title: A Mortal Indiscretion: Author's Cut
description: Librarian's Note: This is an alternate-cover edition for ISBN 9781530762804 A man. A vampire. A love story....Justin Bertolli lived as any 29 year old bachelor would live his life, until a chance encounter with a woman unlike any other. Ambra Taylor was everything he had ever envisioned the perfect woman to be. Young, charming and sensual. But there was something puzzling about Ambra. Justin had questions that he could not answer. Nothing could prepare Justin for what he was about to experience. And nothing could prepare him for a love like no other.
author: Barbra E. Ross
